summary: Build a VPN product with a privacy feature that automatically detects and stops tracking.
architectural_notes: Scope includes VPN functionality plus automatic tracker detection and blocking/anti-tracking privacy controls.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal privacy shield logo with a stop-tracking motif, flat vector style, dark background compatible (vpn-shield-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero illustration showing abstract network nodes with blocked tracker dots, muted green/charcoal palette, flat/modern style (privacy-hero.dim_1200x600.png)

existing_features.title: Build a VPN-like Privacy Dashboard experience (without implementing an actual VPN) that helps users automatically stop tracking by detecting common web/app trackers and blocking them within the app’s simulated traffic model.

Implement tracker detection for user-provided destinations: allow the user to input a URL/domain (and optionally paste a list), scan it against a built-in tracker blocklist, and show which tracker domains would be blocked when “Auto-stop tracking” is enabled.
Connect frontend to backend with React Query for loading/saving privacy settings and custom block entries, including optimistic UI updates and clear error states.

Add a “Protection Log” view that records recent scans/actions in the UI (client-side), including timestamp, input domain/URL, number of trackers detected, and number blocked based on current settings.

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme for a privacy/security product (avoid blue/purple): define consistent colors, typography, spacing, and component styling across the Privacy Dashboard, including light/dark-friendly contrast.
Add and render generated static image assets (logo and hero) from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the dashboard header/empty-state areas.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a VPN with a privacy feature that automatically detects and stops tracking (tracker blocking/anti-tracking).

Create a Motoko backend API to manage anti-tracking settings and blocklists per user principal, including: get/set Auto-stop tracking toggle; get blocklist; add/remove custom blocked domains; reset to defaults.

projectName: Privacy dashboard with automatic anti-tracking controls (VPN-like experience)
